name: node-env-dev
description: Get woke with a better Node.js development environment

scripts.start: npm run -s prep && tsc; node dist/index.js
scripts.watch: npm run -s prep && onchange --verbose --kill dist/**/*.js -- node dist/index.js & tsc --watch

author: Robert Laverty <roblav96@gmail.com> (https://github.com/roblav96)
